items.weapons

Class Dagger

  • java.lang.Object
    • items.weapons.AbstractWeapon
      • items.weapons.Dagger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item, Weapon

    public class Dagger
extends AbstractWeapon
    This class of Weapon represents the damage a character would do when equipped with only the barest minimum of gear.

    This is a Weapon-type Item with a base damage (dmg) of 2. The name of this weapon is "dagger".

    Author:
    Dr. Cheese

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dagger()
      The base constructor of the Dagger class sets its damage (dmg) to 2 and its name to "dagger".

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String attackString(int dmg, Entity user, Entity target)
      This method returns a String containing stylized information on how much the weapon is doing, representing the attack using the weapon.

    • Method Detail

      • attackString

        public java.lang.String attackString(int dmg,
                                     Entity user,
                                     Entity target)
        Description copied from interface: Weapon
        This method returns a String containing stylized information on how much the weapon is doing, representing the attack using the weapon.
        Parameters:
        dmg - How much damage the user is doing with the weapon.
        user - The Entity that is using the weapon.
        target - The target Entity the weapon is being used on.
        Returns:
        A String containing stylized information on what the weapon is doing.
